de.engehausen.treemap
Interface IRectangleRenderer<N,G,C>

Type Parameters:
N - the type of node the rectangle supports.
G - the graphics support type
C - the color type
All Known Implementing Classes:
BorderRenderer, BorderRenderer, CushionRectangleRenderer, CushionRectangleRenderer, CushionRectangleRendererEx, CushionRectangleRendererEx, DefaultRectangleRenderer, DefaultRectangleRenderer, LabelRenderer, LabelRenderer, ScalingLabelRenderer, ScalingLabelRenderer
public interface IRectangleRenderer<N,G,C>

Renderer for rectangles.

Method Summary
 void highlight(G graphics, ITreeModel<IRectangle<N>> model, IRectangle<N> rectangle, IColorProvider<N,C> colorProvider, ILabelProvider<N> labelProvider)
          Renders the given rectangle in "highlighted" mode.
 void render(G graphics, ITreeModel<IRectangle<N>> model, IRectangle<N> rectangle, IColorProvider<N,C> colorProvider, ILabelProvider<N> labelProvider)
          Renders the given rectangle.
 

Method Detail

render

void render(G graphics,
            ITreeModel<IRectangle<N>> model,
            IRectangle<N> rectangle,
            IColorProvider<N,C> colorProvider,
            ILabelProvider<N> labelProvider)
Renders the given rectangle.

Parameters:
graphics - the graphics to render on, must not be null.
model - the model the rectangle belongs to, must not be null.
rectangle - the rectangle to render, must not be null.
colorProvider - provider for the color of the rectangle, must not be null.
labelProvider - provider for the label of the rectangle, may be null.

highlight

void highlight(G graphics,
               ITreeModel<IRectangle<N>> model,
               IRectangle<N> rectangle,
               IColorProvider<N,C> colorProvider,
               ILabelProvider<N> labelProvider)
Renders the given rectangle in "highlighted" mode. An implementor may safely assume that the given rectangle has already been rendered onto the graphics normally.

Parameters:
graphics - the graphics to render on, must not be null.
model - the model the rectangle belongs to, must not be null.
rectangle - the rectangle to render, must not be null.
colorProvider - provider for the color of the rectangle, must not be null.
labelProvider - provider for the label of the rectangle, may be null.
